title.rendered: Free Summer Meals Available for Students

content.rendered: Students can enjoy free summer meals from Monday to Friday, from July 8 through August 16. Meals will be served from the SSCSD food truck at Maple Avenue Middle School from 10:30 to 11:00 a.m. and at Jefferson Terrace from 11:15 a.m. to 12:00 p.m. each day. Don’t miss out on this opportunity!
